0111010000111110 1111111010101111 0 -> sum: 0111001011101101, cout: 1
1000111110001100 0010100101001111 1 -> sum: 1011100011011100, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
